    Functions to plot DESeq2 results

    graphTools.Rd

    Functions to plot DESeq2 results

    graphTools(
  res,
  maxpadj,
  minlfc,
  device = "png",
  output_folder = ".",
  width = 7,
  height = 7,
  plot.title = NULL
)

    Arguments

    res

    Data frame object with DESeq2 results

    maxpadj

    P-adjusted value for significant features

    minlfc

    Value for dysregulated features

    device

    Format for graphs ("pdf", "svg", "eps", "png", "tiff", "jpeg"). A vector for several formats can be uses: c("svg", "png")

    output_folder

    Folder where graphs will be saved

    width

    Graph width in inches

    height

    Graph height in inches

    plot.title

    Text for graph titles

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  graphTools(res, maxpadj, minlfc, device, 
             output, plot.title = plot.title)
} # }
